Name: Purple Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: If shaken this becomes more of a grey cosmo. The flavour and colour make for an interesting twist.
History: For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Purple Cosmo contains 208 calories
